tag_list: software-development-outsourcing, iphone-application-development, android-apps-development, php-web-development, delphi-development, java-development, asp-net-development, porting--migration, software-testing
overview:
OTS Solutions is one of the leading offshore software development service providers, offering an array of IT related services to its clients across the globe. With sound domain knowledge we aim to deliver value to our customers through our innovative software solutions and services.

Since our inception, we have steadily grown into a reputed provider of high-quality and cost-effective software development services. Our ability to evolve continuously, doubled with our flexible approach towards the dynamic business world has helped us to gain success in short span of time. Today, OTS provides offshore as well as onsite software development services to its clients across the globe.

milestones.description: OTS Solutions, a global software product development and outsourcing provider announced that they attended Internet World 2011 in London
milestones.source_description: OTS attends Internet World 2011 at Earls Court, London

milestones.description: Geeta Naresh added a position as SEO LEAD at OTS Solutions
